entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:53 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 11:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: S 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
